name: Taskwarrior import/export
description: This script creates menu items and buttons to import and export Taskwarrior tasks. Dependencies Unix-like OSes only! Taskwarrior Usage The script takes selected text from your note and parse it to create task entries based on it. The following rules currently apply for the test to be parsed correctly: * the project is defined by writing "project:" (case-insensitive) immediately followed by the project name; the rest of the line content is skipped * the task is defined by making a list item, using either - (minus) or * (asterisk) at the beginning; the task description taken will be used with the most recently detected project name to create a new task To Do * write "import" part of the script * foolproof used regexps * make project nesting easier * use headers to determine project name and nesting * Windows support
